name: HSP_PREADM_CONFRM
description: This table contains information on a confirmed preadmission. Each record in this table is based on patient contact serial number.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the patient that was preadmission confirmed.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the preadmission confirmed for the patient.

columns.name: PREADM_CONFRM_INST
columns.description: Instant when the preadmission was confirmed.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique contact serial number for the encounter.
